lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I'm thrilled that something so small to me can mean so much to someone else -- and that there's a way for us to connect with each other.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I design clever ways to help people learn how to be better at their jobs.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that by helping a little, we all benefit.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am aware of the fact that there are people out there who are less fortunate than me that can benefit a tremendous amount from something that seems so small to most people. I want people to be given the same opportunity to succeed and live a satisfying life just as I have been given.

lenders.name: Anders Berg
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help other people who doesn't live in the civilized part of the world.

lenders.name: Jesper
lenders.loan_because: we all have to care more about each other

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: I believe that there is a huge categorical difference between a handout and a help up. Microloans are that difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Political science and philosophy graduate of Loyola University Chicago. Graduate student in International Relations at Salve Regina University.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.occupation: design iron accessories for the home

lenders.name: Jes R. Larsen
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great initiative and an opportunity to make a difference for someone else.

lenders.name: Alfredo
lenders.loan_because: I want to help needy /deserving ones

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I think all people need sometimes is a chance to try.

lenders.name: Cori-Ann
lenders.loan_because: It can help further a fellow entrepreneur's business.

lenders.name: James Darling
lenders.loan_because: This is far more profitable than my bank
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer software that helps cities recover from disasters.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Each of us has the responsibility to better another person's life--through our thoughts, our time, or our money.  I believe in the power of micro-enterprise development and how it can positively impact a life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with low-income families through a non-profit organization that helps people start small businesses in Minnesota (one of the coldest states in the USA).

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because:
I find it amazing and gratifying that I can help
others with, what in the US, are small amounts of money  but can make a big difference in peoples' lives. These loans make me feel that I am directly helping specific people. It's great for all of us!
lenders.occupational_info:
My work now that I am retired is to help in my
community by giving of my time for free. I give my time at a local arboretum by keeping the library open and helping this organization to raise money.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because: I want to see my loans make a difference in people's lives and allow people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: I realized that instead of buying a new pair of pants or a shirt that I don't need, I can positively change the life of one person and his/her family. It's one of many ways of contributing for a better world.

lenders.name: isabel
lenders.loan_because:
i think that sharing is a good idea to change the world
And we must change it
This is a good way to start
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a public hospital, in the outpatient clinic, the noninvasive exams department and the emergency room

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I love to travel and explore all the wonderful places and people this world has to offer. Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities live in the community.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: God gives me a happy life. So I need to help others, a way to say thank you,my God!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: To be able to touch someone's life around the world - that's amazing!
lenders.occupational_info: Find new ways of extracting metal from ores.

lenders.name: Cynthia and Max
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the biggest changes come from many people taking small steps to make the world a better place.  I am blessed with opportunities and hope to share these gifts with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a firefighter in a big city.  My job is to put out the fires, as well as help people who are sick or injured.  I love my work!

lenders.name: Drucilla
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy.  And you feel like you are truly doing something that might possibly change someone's life.  Isn't that what it is all about? And what we want in our own lives?
lenders.occupational_info: I create environmental television.

lenders.name: Anne Marie Caragea
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place in every way I can.

lenders.name: Ms M's economics class
lenders.loan_because: we dare to be more!
lenders.occupational_info: we are a class of 7 economics students

lenders.name: KC in Old Town
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I want to help women around the world, particularly in countries where they face oppression.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops large solar projects worldwide.

lenders.name: Antonio
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: Heidi Daugherty
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others succeed and prosper in a peaceful world.  Remember to spay, neuter and adopt your best friend.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: We are one Body...
lenders.occupational_info: Diagnose medical conditions using medical imaginag.

lenders.name: Richard & Nancy
lenders.loan_because: we would appreciate the loan if the situation were reversed.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it brings far places that I will probably never see closer to me and I admire the entrepeneurs who are establishing their businesses in this difficult world.
lenders.occupational_info: While a librarian I made books and information available to anyone who was looking for it. Now I garden, ride my horse and try to make my community a better place for those who live in it.

lenders.name: Duane and Maureen
lenders.loan_because: it's so awesome that such a small amount of money changes lives in a very powerful way.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both in the business world, so we are drawn toward these small business owners!  The challenges they face are much more difficult than anything we have ever been through.

lenders.name: ccyl
lenders.loan_because: "If you can't do something smart, do something right."  This is both.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people tell the US government that we want to end poverty at home and abroad.  I help others learn how they can help fight hunger and the worst aspects of poverty.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Small efforts can have a big impact for others.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: it's exciting and rewarding to be a small part of giving someone in another country the opportunity to start and/or enhance their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large law firm in Silicon Valley in the Intellectual Property Department.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It helps improve the world just a little bit at a time.

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: A family member referred me, and it's a good thing to do.  Everyone needs a little help sometime.
lenders.occupational_info: I count money.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Luke 12:48 - From everyone who has been given much, much will be required, and from the one who has been entrusted with much, even more will be asked.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to be able to help people improve their livelihoods and better provide for their families.

lenders.name: Abe
lenders.loan_because: I like to help working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly my spaceship and secretly rule the world.

lenders.name: Alizabeth
lenders.loan_because: people belive and help me, so i try to also believe in and help others

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: Many years ago, with a $500 bank loan I started a business that grew steadily, did good work, and -- most important to me -- created jobs. It was the most challenging and rewarding venture of my life (short of childraising). I want others to have that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Former business owner, now disabled/retired.

lenders.name: Mr. M students

lenders.occupational_info: I teach at the University School of Milwaukee in Wisconsin, U.S.A.

lenders.name: JayWu
lenders.loan_because: Paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do this in honor of all the people who have inspired me along the way....

I am a firm believer that the chain of poverty can be broken. The end.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed and support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am finishing my last year in school, looking for a marketing jo, possibly in the nonprofit sector.

lenders.name: Salvador
lenders.loan_because: People need a chance to make their dreams a reality.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I can do my part even if its small
lenders.occupational_info: I am an economics major in my senior year of college.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe--in the dignity of work and supporting people's dreams for a better tomorrow if they're just given an opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: I used to do the paperwork that helps organizations and people borrow money interest-free from the city to build or buy affordable housing for low income families.

lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying International Relations at Seattle Pacific University.

lenders.name: Marie-Line
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to got all these chances in my life that I want to return something to other people. I wish everyone was as lucky as me.

lenders.loan_because: I believe that if every person in the world, lend, even if a dollar, we could create better oportunities for a lot of people.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, my job consist in contact, deal, and follow small to high companies, in their mobile telecomunication serviçes

lenders.name: Scott Keefer
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people in other parts of the world in a real and meaningful way.  I make a donation to A Clear Direction's KIVA portfolio each time a client has referred us to someone who takes up our services.  KIVA's philosophy sits well with my business as it is engaging in investments that are improving real lives for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide independent financial advice to clients including - Financial Planning Strategy, Investment, Life Insurances, Superannuation and Retirement Planning, Debt Reduction and Cash Flow Management.

lenders.name: Mia & Jesper
lenders.loan_because: We believe this is the best way to help

lenders.name: Beatrice and Luc
lenders.loan_because:
Life is easier for some of us and a lot more difficult for others. Nevertheless we cannot help everybody. But there are 2 proverbs we'd like to share.

This one about the sea stars, when someone on the beach seeing all these sea stars drying and wondering what difference would it make to put one back in the water when there are so many dying. Looking at the one he had in his hand he thought : at least it will make a difference for this one.

And the other proverb says that it is better to learn fishing than to give fish to someone, for evident reasons....

Kiva is just all of this. Simply BRILLIANT!!!
lenders.occupational_info: We work for econology (Ecology at good price)  and we love it !!!!!

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: Generosity consists in giving before beeing asked

lenders.name: Pat C.
lenders.loan_because: microloans make the most sense for the most people, a way for each of us to help everyone of us.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.whereabouts: Vila Nova de Gaia Vila Nova de Gaia

lenders.occupational_info: Father, cook, software architect...

lenders.name: Wendell & Chris
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to show gratitude for all our blessings. Sharing a little of what we have can make such a big difference in someone's life. We are honored to be members of the KIVA community.
lenders.occupational_info: Chris-I help teachers teach and students learn with library resources and computers

lenders.name: Andreas

lenders.loan_because: It is a way I feel connected with others around the world.

lenders.loan_because: To give is to receive

lenders.occupational_info: I try to not work. I want to do just what make me feel happy, with good outcomes for others.

lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm finishing my masters degree in computer engineering.

lenders.loan_because:

and mirco loans empower!
this is just the charity I have been looking for!
Thank you Kiva!! :)

lenders.name: Howard

lenders.occupational_info: Occupancy managing in a Hotel.

lenders.name: R and P
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should get a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in the concept of micro-financing.  For such relatively small amounts of money in our society, you can make a huge positive difference in someone's life while preserving their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a website called HarmonyWishes which has images from around the world that can be sent as electronic greeting cards.  It's aim is to promote spiritual tolerance and diversity.  We are constantly bombarded with negative images by the media.  HarmonyWishes aims to balance those images with ones of hope and beauty.

lenders.name: judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams of becoming independent.
lenders.occupational_info: Over the road trucking. Pick up and delivery 48 states and Canada. Very rewarding job. I am proud that I (a woman)made it through truck driving school and now can do something I love to do for a living.

lenders.occupational_info: i work in the office for an int'l shipping company. We transport containers with cargo around the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I am 9 and in school.

lenders.name: Pedro Mateus
lenders.loan_because: I believe each of us can change the world with small actions

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes sense to me. I believe the funds will uplift many families and provide them the tools to help them benefit and prosper. I am their neighbour, no matter the distance.
lenders.occupational_info:
Caring for the man I love who has prostate cancer. Cooking , (love it!)
Gardening (not my forte, but I try) and spending as much time with friends and family as possible.

lenders.name: James McGovern
lenders.loan_because: I am savage in the pursuit of improving the human condition. Besides, It's our responsibility to help others less prosperous than ourselves...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the computer field with a focus on software security. I have authored several books. I have two sons and the most perfect wife. I am truly blessed.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I want to help honest people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I solve problems for people.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: it's important that money facilitates progress, change, and encourages financial responsibility. If the adage of teaching a man to fish holds true, I would rather help to solve a problem rather than delay it.
lenders.occupational_info: I study computer science at New Mexico State University, located in the southern United States.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be so close in working toward a dream and to fall short because of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I've worked for major internet companies, a national magazine, and a hollywood studio.  I've also dug ditches, fried burgers, and scrubbed toilets.  All professionally.  I'm proud of all the work I've done.

lenders.name: Brenda Olson-Wray
lenders.loan_because: I've made a loan on behalf of my father, Dwight Olson. I have his name this year for Christmas and we have to give something homemade. I didn't quite follow the rules but my dad is big on giving to others so to honor this I gave a loan to help someone provide for their family. Plus my dad is big on eating so what better to support than a bakery:)

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the unity of mankind and the dignity of work done in the spirit of service. By loaning through Kiva, I hope to promote those ideals, in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young people about the lifetime sport of disc golf (golf played with frisbee-like discs) and promote events of the sport.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Eirik made me do it

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that it makes a difference in someone's life and it is all going to the right place.
lenders.occupational_info: Work with people who are dying and with older people in nursing homes.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I market and sell computer technology for securing electronic payments.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to have the opportunities that I have had.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Part of our responsibility in life is to assist others.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people need a chance to create a dignified existence and chase their dreams.

lenders.name: Ryan

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people succeed in their businesses and their dreams. I especially wish to help women who may not have the same opportunities as the men in their countries.

Indigos are spiritually advanced people who often feel they don't fit in and may seem rebellious, but are truly remarkable people that will thrive if they are supported. I also do psychic readings and energy healing (Shamballa Reiki). My most important work, however, is being a mom to my son who was born this past year.

lenders.name: Carter and Grant
lenders.loan_because: We care about others and we love animals!

lenders.loan_because: I have been so lucky and everyone deserves to reach their dreams.

lenders.name: aaron
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.occupational_info: I help make computer software work by designing features and driving projects to completion.

lenders.name: I Team Students
lenders.loan_because: We are very proud that the World Food Prize is held every year in Des Moines Iowa!  As part of learning about one of the previous World Food Prize laureates (later named 2006 Nobel Peace Prize recipient!)we watched a video called Pennies a Day (Izzit.org) which described the impact microloans can have on the lives of people in need.  We had a "Penny War" contest between classes and raised $150.00 to fund 6 $25.00 microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: We are Iowa junior high students who are learning that we can do community service globally as well as locally through organizations like Kiva!
